properties.entry: Si us plau, paga a l'organitzador l'aposta per l'esdeveniment: $1. Si ja ho has fet, comunicali ell o ella.
Aviat rebrà el guany. En cas contrari, fer pressió sobre els organitzadors. :-)
Ompliu les teves dades bancàries de manera que es pot pagar-te.
Omple el teu nom, pel que els jugadors sàpiguen qui ets.
Carrega una foto al seu perfil, en cas contrari, és un porc.
Des d’aquí pots organitzar la teva oficina d’apostes, es a dir ajustar membres, administrar les apostes, etc… Fixa’t en el menú.
No podràs tornar enrere. Vols activar el joc d’apostes?
Aquesta secció no està disponible fins que no s’hagi activat el joc d’apostes.
El joc d’apostes ha estat activat. Els membres ja s’hi poden inscriure.
Hola $1 Has estat admès al joc $2. Pots començar a fer els teus pronòstics. http://donmiguel.sagex.ch
La inscripció està tancada. Però encara pots inscriure un altre jugador:
No pots entrar més partits alhora. Has de guardar.

Aquest joc encara no està actiu i per això no és visible per als usuaris. No podeu editar els botons de “tancament d’inscripció”, “moneda”, “Aposta per partit”, “precisió d’arrodoniment” fins que el joc no estigui actiu.
Afegeix o modifica partits. Si vols canviar el nom d’un equip al llarg de tot l’esdeveniment prem Canviar competidor.
Encara no existeixen partits per aquest esdeveniment. Prem + partit par afegir partits. Ves amb compte! Has d’escriure l’hora en el format correcte.
Edita un element de la llista següent
llista de tots els elements incomplerts
llista de tots els elements incomplerts en la llengua emprada
En els tres camps següents has d’indicar el lloc on els participants han de transferir els diners.
..el segon és pel número del compte (número del compte corrent, postal o IBAN)..
El primer camp és pel tipus de compte (per exemple compte bancari o compte corrent postal)..
Una petita descripció o títol que apareixerà com a encapçalament de la pàgina web.
Defineix el nombre de línies que apareixeran en formularis llargs, per exemple on apostes.
Tria un idioma per la pàgina web.
Quin nom vols que tingui la teva oficina d’apostes?
Escull un estil per la teva pàgina web.
Per fer un comentari has de participar en algun joc d’apostes.
No s’ha pogut desar el comentari.
Vull anar a a casa
Aquest usuari no és membre d’aquest joc d’apostes
El formulari encara conté errades (marcades en vermell).
El nom d’usuari o la contrasenya són incorrectes.
Hi ha un problema. Prova-ho un altre vegada.
No tens permís per presentar informacions per aquest joc.
No t’has pogut registrar perquè les teves entrades han produït un conflicte.
Aquest nom d’usuari ja està registrat.
No s’ha pogut desar. Prova-ho la inscripció una altra vegada.
No tens permís per accedir a aquesta pàgina.
Possibles resultats a la segona fase (fase d’eliminatòries): només
S’ha de fer l’aposta el dia anterior al partit abans de les 23H59. A las 00H00 del dia del partit ja no podràs apostar.
Si arribes tard l’has cagat. Ja no pots modificar res.
La suma del que guanyes en total és el que guanyes durant el joc d’apostes més la teva part del pot.
Si ningú ha encertat el resultat,
amb el guanyador correcte guanyes ($1 3-2 en comptes de 4-1) $2 punt(s)
Si algú va apostar el resultat correcte guanya tot l’import de les apostes d’aquest partit (es a dir: # participants * $1)
Si hi ha més d’un jugador que aposta el resultat correcte, l’import de les apostes d’aquest partit serà repartit entre ells. Si queda algun residu es sumarà al pot.
Conclusions de partits possibles en la primera fase (fase de grups):
El repartiment del pot depèn dels punts guanyats. Com més punts tinguis, més part del pot t’emportes.
Es repartirà el pot entre els primers $1 de la classificació.
The distribution will happen in a exponential manner. The formula will be: "Share(Rank) = (Jackpot / Σ(Sharer Ranks)) * (Sharers - (Rank – 1))".

El pot serà repartit de forma exponencial. La fórmula que fem servir és: "part(posició) = (1-k)^(posició-1) * k * pot" . Naturalment encara queda alguna cosa al pot. Per a la resta seguirem aplicant la mateixa fórmula fins que no quedi res. k per aquest joc d’apostes $1. Això significa que el primer de la classificació guanya una mica més de $2 del pot.
If multiple participants have the same amount of points, the jackpot shares of the concerning ranks will be added up and the money equally distributed on the participants in question.
To be sure that nobody is able to cheat, the bets of all the participants are visible to the others and the accounts are password-protected.
If a match is settled by penalty shoot-out, the winner team gets an extra goal added to the match score.
During the betting game, points are distributed to the participants:
For every match, an exact score is betted:
How the betting game works is explained in the following points:
not to forget: $1's thoroughly well desgnied seal of approval:
The stake for every match (every single bet) is $1. In total, $2 matches are going to be played - thus, the stake for all the matches is $3.
To this, $1 is added to the stake.
This part does directly go into the jackpot
This part of the stake is directly destined to the winner.
The whole bet sum is an amount of $1! This amount is to be wired before the first bet can be placed.
Do you want to change the language?
Yet, there are no played matches for this betting game.
You are going to be redirected immediatly.

This site gives you the possibility to bet on sport events.
For you can participate, you have to register yourself by following this link: register.

If you already have an account, you can log yourself in
Currently, there are following active betting games:
Yet, there aren't any public betting games active.
Fill in the neccessary information in order to log in:
So far, you're not participating in any betting game. You can go announce yourself to an event in your profile as well as adjust other settings. Besides that, there's not so much you can do for now.
You participate in following betting game:
You participate in following betting games:
You're now logged out and you're going to be redirected now.

In this area you can determine your appearance to the others and the appearance of the betting office to you. Furthermore you can change your password. <p/> For all the changes you'd like to effect, use the submenus.
Enter one time the old and two times the desired password to change it.
To change the eMail you have to enter it two times.

Here, you can register yourself to betting games, besides other things.
An "open" betting game is open to you to participate, a "waiting" betting game means, that you have to wait for the admission by an admin, "approved" & "denied" betting games are those betting games where you're definitively participating, or definitevely not participating, respectively.

After changing anzthing (z.b. clicking on participate) you have to click on "save changes" below
If you have done that, you can write an email to $1 to inform the admin(s)

This event has $1 matches on which $2 are bet per match. Therefore one has to bet a total of $3 to be allowed to take part on this betting game. To order to be admitted, the just mentioned sum should be wired to the organisator of this betting game.

As wiring comment, you sould write:
$1: $2 participates!
You should participate on an betting game before you can place any bets. Go participate or, if already done, wait until your approved by the administrator.

The overview serves you to get all the important information you need about a betting game What do the others bet on? Who is the leader?
The summaries display collected Money & Points of the particular user.
For you can see as much information as possible you can minimize the menu to the right.
Unfortunately, there are no betting games to to overview so far!
Find out who with whom you are playing.
Yet there are no events where one could already participate.
This betting game hasn't got any participants yet.
To be able to register to a betting game you have to create a user profile first, with wich you can log you on. Not until then you can participate in an event.
You've been registered successfully. An eMail with a password in it has been sent to you. Quite ofthen tough, it is hold back by the spam filter - therefore here's the eMail:
all the stakes betted for this match move in the jackpot.
The next tips are not public yet.
Correctly betted goal difference for the correct team (e.g. 3-2 instead of 2-1)
Correctly bettet game concluseion (like toto) for the correct team (e.g. 1-0 instead of 4-1)
Indicate where the gain should be wired to after the betting game:
Do you really want to particiapte in this betting game?
Do you really not want to participate?
This is a new message by $1, sent $2 $3:
Choose your preferred language for the website
Distribute the jackpot on a fraction of the participants (in %) or on a fix number of participants.
Type in the fraction in Percent (e.g. 33% for the first third)
Type in until what rank the jackpot is going to be distributed.
You first have to define the amount of sharers!
This feld indicates the fix share of the Jackpot (click on $1 or in the field in order to make changes).
Fill in a coefficient (inferior to 0) for the exponential distribution. The first ranked will get about this share of the jackpot (coefficient * jackpot).

You can bet on either
-Score of the match: 3-2, 1-3, 0-0
-Toto of the match: 1 = Home team wins, 2 = Away team wins, x = tie
Are there knockout-matches in this betting game? In such matches, there has to be a winner, the loser is out and no tie is possible.

How will be the result after a possible penalty shootout?
- add all the penalties to the result
- add one goal to the winner team score
those who guessed the correct match conclusion ($1/$2/$3) nevertheless get their stake for this bet ($4) back. The rest of the stakes moves into the Jackpot.
There is no stake for this betting game, meaning that you don't have to pay anything in order to participate.
The stake for this betting game is a fix amount about $1.
In this betting game, you will bet on toto (possible match conclusions). That means one has theoreticall the three possibilities: $1$2$3.
There are $1 as well as $2 in this betting game.
The score considered$1, si the one at the end of the Match (without penalty shootout).
If a match is decided by a penalty shootout,
one goal will be added to the score of the winner team.
all penalty goals will be added to the score.
The bets have to be placed until $1 before $2.
a correctly betted goal difference ($1 0-3 instead of 1-4) is worth $2 point(s)
an absolutely wrong bet is worth $3 point(s)

You asked for your user data for the $1. A new password, which you can alter easily, was automatically generated.
$2
$3
-----------------------------
$4
Your user data was sent to $1
There is no user account with this eMail address
Sorry, but it's not possible to send eMails from this server.
Please write an eMail about your problem to the administrator. You will find the address in the footer of this site.
There already is an user account with this very eMail!
The username's length must not be longer than 15 characters
Here you can ask for your user data by indicating your eMail address
Indicate the URL to access this website.
Choose in what cases and how you want to be notified.
Upon a participation on a betting game
Upon a creation of a new user account
Upon a withdrawal from a betting game
Thus, the eMail is displayed here:
A new user account has been created.
$1 wants to participate in the betting game $2.
The sending of emails by SMTP is activated!

In order to be able to send emails you need an SMTP-access. Either there is one at your service on this very server or you make use of an SMTP-access on another Server (f.ex. your private email address).
The sender address does not necessarily have to correspond with the address of the SMTP-access. Altough, a few server only accept "alien" sender addresses if they have been confirmed before.
Is only in rare cases not 465
The sending of emails by SMTP is disactivated! It is not possible to send emails from this website.
The test email could not be sent with these parameters! The sending of emails is now deactivated!
A test email has been sent successfully to $1! Sending emails is now activated.
Successfully activated email sending by SMTP!

From now on you can let yourself be notified or send a note to other users by email from the website. Furthermore, the registration is better now, since an email with the password is sent to a new user!

Meh Informatione zu SMTP:

  • Wikipedia
  • Google Support
No entry corresponds to this filter.

In case that nobody betted the correct score, should the match stake be returned at least to those who anticipated a correct final match state? If you choose no, the whole stake for the match goes into the jackpot.
It is only possible to return the stake for the match if the bet is placed on an exact score!

Until when should the bets be placed?
Either a fix amount of minutes or days before the game or the start of the betting game.
Choosing minutes, the time is exactly measured as indicated, but choosing days, ONLY the date is important. 1 day before = the day before
Before the start of the betting game means, that ALL the bets have to be placed before the first match.
ONLY if you are really sure, that everything is set as you wish, go to
The total win sum is the share on the jackot. The player with the most points receives the greatest share and is thus the winner.
The fix distribution will happen in the following way:
Invalid rank for fix jackpot distribution!
The amount of ranks does not correspond to the fix jackpot shares.
Invalid coefficient for the exponential distribution!
Invalid entry for the betting deadline!
Invalid point amount for correct bets!
Invalid point amount for score difference bets!
Invalid point amount for final match state bets!
Invalid point amount for wrong bets!
This part is only available from phase 3 on.

Now you have the possibility to adjust the schedule, as long the betting game not visible. Everything except "$2" you can adjust now, you can also adjust after the activation, but only activate if you really want that it should be visible to the users!
How would you enter the score after the game?
The amount of matches in the schedule is not equal to the amount of matches set for this betting game.
The already existing matches will be deleted!
The winner is the one with the most points.
